Articles.Content:
I did a quick search and did not find any, but is there a mod that randomly selects your pilot for every mission? I'm gettin real tired of Jeb getting all the glory, and even if I put him (and Bill and Bob) in a can somewhere the game just selects the next guy on the list all the time. :/

Yes, doing it manually is possible but that also gets tedious, and I usually just forget.
Theres this one, although the download isn't up now: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86960-24-RandomCrew-Randomize-default-crewing/page3

If you don't want to do it manually, then when you get tired of the orange suits you could just stick them in a space station and leave them there for a while. Actually, once you have a lot of continually manned stations and bases or do lots of missions at once, you'll have a lot more variety anyway.

Thanks for the tip Mr.Rocket. He even updated it before I had time to reply here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87473-24-RealRoster-No-more-crew-reset!-Default-crew-randomization!-RC1-7-21-11
